questionTitle: Your <u><font color='red'>personality</font></u> <u><font color='red'>is</font></u> important <u><font color='red'>for</font></u> the success <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> your work.
The surgeon <u><font color='red'>is</font></u> a <u><font color='red'>genius</font></u>. We <u><font color='red'>are not</font></u> doubtful <u><font color='red'>on</font></u> it.
Why <u><font color='red'>are</font></u> you angry <u><font color='red'>with</font></u> me? I <u><font color='red'>hadn't do</font></u> anything <u><font color='red'>wrong</font></u>.
I hope he's ________ to buy some bread; there's hardly any left.
If I were you, I ________ that dress while you have the money.
The vet decided that he had to operate ________ the cat to save its life.
I ________ like to apologize for not replying to your letter earlier.
Many accidents in the home could be ________ if householders gave more thought to safety in their houses.
Try to remember ________ bring your umbrella .
The bride looked absolutely ________ in her wedding-dress.
Susie didn't leave for the station until the very ________ moment.
When are you going to give back that money you ________ me?
My uncle was ________ by a gang of terrorist last week.
Each ________ of the family had to take it in turns to do the washing up.
He performs beautifully ________ the piano.
He comes ________ drawing lessons twice a week.
My aunt ________ a brightly-coloured thread round her finger so as not to forget her appointment.
You have a new baby-son? ________!
If my documents ________ last week, I would have been able to come back at least five days ago.
Children and old people do not take kindly to having their daily ________ upset.

If that firm wants to attract workers it must ________ the pay.
